name: Strategic Command World War I: The Great War 1914-1918
name_original: Strategic Command World War I: The Great War 1914-1918
description:
Strategic Command World War I: The Great War 1914-1918 is a strategy game developed by Fury Software. It came out on 01-03-2011. It was published by Battlefront.com.
You can play Strategic Command World War I: The Great War 1914-1918 on PC.
